name: Formula Wincars: MMO Racing Arcade
blurb: Manage your own race squad, increase your skills level, team up with friends and compete to win tournament prizes on wild circuits!

rewards.reward: No Reward
GOOD KARMA \r\n==============================\r\nYour name will appear in the credits + Our eternal grattitude

EARLY BIRD OFFER ==============================\r\nDRM-free digital copy of the game + Your name will appear in the credits + In-game Backer Bundle (more info in the Rewards tier) + Exclusive access to closed beta + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

BACKER BASIC PACK ============================== \r\nDRM-free digital copy of the game + You will be in the credits + In-game Backer Bundle + Exclusive access to closed beta reward + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
ART ON WHEELS ============================== \r\nAll above rewards + Digital Art Book (Pdf) + Wallpapers + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

DEVELOPMENT SURVEYS ==============================\r\nAll above rewards + Participate in project development surveys + Vote for the future prizes for tournaments + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
FORMULA RADIO ==============================\r\nAll above rewards + Digital Game soundtrack + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
BOXED GAME ==============================\r\nAll above rewards + Exclusive physical game edition + In-game Backer Bundle Reward + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
DUE TO WEAR ==============================\r\nAll above rewards + T-shirt + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
RALLY WELCOME KIT ==============================\r\nAll above rewards + You\u2019ll get Rally car, driver and circuit unlocked from the start + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
SPORT WELCOME KIT ============================== \r\nAll above rewards + You\u2019ll get Sport car, driver and circuit unlocked from the start + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

COMPETITION WELCOME KIT ============================== \r\nAll above rewards + You\u2019ll get Competition car, driver and circuit unlocked from the start + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
A(R)T FULL SPEED ============================== All above rewards + 64 pages book \u201cThe Art of Formula Wincars\u201d + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

HALL OF FAME ============================== All above rewards + Your name will get a place in the Hall of fame, located in one of the circuit\u2019s pavement + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

FORMULA SPONSOR ============================== All above rewards + Your picture or a logo you create (after previous acceptance) will be placed as an ad in one of the 10 places reserved to that purpose + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
CONTROLLER ============================== All above rewards up to $200 tier + Formula Wincars Themed Controller with your name on it + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

CAR DESIGNER ============================== All above rewards up to $200 tier + We\u2019ll design a new car based on your descriptions (within reason) + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

CREATE A DRIVER ==============================\r\nAll above rewards up to $200 tier + Collaborate in the creation of a new driver (visual aspect, background\u2026.) together with the studio + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

PRESIDENTIAL DRIVE ==============================\r\nAll above rewards up to $200 tier + Your face will appear in Formula Wincars' Mount Rushmore placed in one of our circuits, hence everyone will be able to see it while playing + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points

CREATE A CIRCUIT ============================== \r\nAll above rewards up to $200 tier + Collaborate in the creation of a new circuit based on your ideas (chance to set it in a location of your choice) + All your pledge value converted intro Driving Points

MOST WANTED ============================== You will collaborate with us to create an original driver and you\u2019ll become a MOST WANTED player (more info in the Rewards tier) + An original, signed drawing of the driver, and other goodies + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points.

THE ARCADE CABINET MACHINE ============================== \r\nAll above rewards up to $200 tier + Formula Wincars themed Arcade Machine including steering wheel, pedals and the game installed and ready to play (more info in the Rewards tier) + All your pledge value converted into Driving Points
